subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=108|rad=皿|as=05|sn=10|four=20101|canj=HDBT|ids=⿱禾皿}}

# a [[ritual]] [[vessel]] used in [[ancient]] [[China]] to make [[wine]] and [[hot]] [[liquid]]s, as well as [[pour]]ing [[alcohol]] on the [[ground]] during [[ceremonies]] to honor [[ancestor]]s.
